column5: Caught 1 miniature Pike and a decent sized pike again this afternoon. Both fish were caught on a spoon, the little guy chased in a spinnerbait then i threw the spoon out and he came out of nowhere and smashed it lol, it was exciting haha.  Here are the pictures Baby Pike!!   And the decent pike maybe 1 hour later. Saw some little 1 lb bass up really shallow in groups of 2 but no piggies on the beds yet from my location. Anyway got work tomorrow, have a god week everybody and until next time,   MTBF
can i use them pikes for my hammer head ?
Haha, you tru being stuck at this end of the world. If there were big Pike there I would catch them haha. Bring me to your lakes so I can catch monsters!

Great report. The spoon is the least used lure in my tackle. Even though I did catch one on a Williams wobbler last week. I've caught a few fish on spoons and seen alot of big fish caught on spoons, but just dont use them as much. But they are great for pike in shallow water.
